transcript: You're a cruel thing and I, I loved you. I think God I realized who you are before I decided to marry you again. Oh my God never

segments.text: You're a cruel thing and I, I loved you. I think God I realized who you are before I decided to marry you again. Oh my God never

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: You are a cruel fiend and I-I loath you.  I thank God I realized who you are before I decided to marry you again.  Oh my God, never!
